oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tate Spring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tate Spring "The Carlsbad of America" The World's Work Advertiser. Greatly enlarged and newly equipped throughout, offers every comfort pleasure and diversion of the ideal mountain summer resort; and in the Celebrated Tate Spring Epsom Water, guests are afforded the finest natural remedy in America for Kidney, Liver and Stomach disorders. Sold by all druggists or shipped direct. Write for booklet to Thos. Tomlinson, Owner, Tate Spring, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hotels; Springs; Resorts; Advertisements;
